text: Andrzej Tomza (6 August 1931 - 17 June 2006) was a Polish sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. He was shot dead in his garden in 2006. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Polish male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Poland Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Lublin Category:Deaths by firearm in Poland
title: Andrzej Tomza
